pageProps.intro:
Most of the stuff you build nowadays is only possible because of the people from the open source community. I try to give back as well.

Some of my personal projects include:

projects.name: Shawerma
projects.description: a collection of helpers for working with serverless on AWS

projects.name: Funda
projects.description: an opinionated tool to create a Node.js serverless project

projects.name: Monod
projects.description: a CLI deployment helper for monorepo serverless project

projects.name: Log Dawg
projects.description: push logs from your js frontend to AWS Cloudwatch
